A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The best Star Wars film since Empire. People who come away disappointed and the fans who made the expectations way too high with the wild fan theories and got angry when those theories were not fulfilled. Also\, the majority of complaints about the film pertain to elements in the greater story that weren't answered because this is the middle in a trilogy. If anything this film sets up those questions even higher for the next film. Pacing was an issue but felt nicer the second time\, and you really notice other details in the film that explain later plot points in the narrative. Overall a fantastic film that has its own ambitions in the story and the deeper meaning of the force.
